Question: Fandom CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Razer

Product 1
- Razer Blade 16 gaming laptop with OLED 240Hz screen, NVIDIA® GeForce RTX 4090 graphics, Intel® Core i9-14900HX processor
- Blade 14 and Blade 18 models with Calman-verified displays, dynamic lighting control, and THX integration

Product 2
- Razer Iskur V2 gaming chair with EPU-grade synthetic leather, 4D armrests, and memory foam head cushion

Product 3
- Razer Sensa HD Haptics for immersive gaming experiences

Product 4
- Razer USB C Dock with 11-port design

Product 5
- Aether Monitor Light Bar with dual lighting and Color Rendering Index (CRI) of 97
Summary_cn:
雷蛇

产品1
- Razer Blade 16 游戏笔记本电脑，具有OLED 240Hz 屏幕，NVIDIA® GeForce RTX 4090 图形，Intel® Core i9-14900HX 处理器
- Blade 14 和 Blade 18 型号，具有 Calman 验证的显示屏，动态照明控制和 THX 集成

产品2
- Razer Iskur V2 游戏椅，采用 EPU 级合成皮革，4D 扶手和记忆海绵头枕

产品3
- Razer Sensa HD 触觉技术，提供沉浸式游戏体验

产品4
- Razer USB C Dock，11口设计

产品5
- Aether Monitor Light Bar，双重照明和97 的色彩还原指数 (CRI)
